formElement.label: Java Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of java. i.e: "java", "java.exe" or "/path/to/java". (Required)

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Deployment name to assign to a newly-deployed application or standalone module. i.e: "webapp". (Required)

formElement.label: Application Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the application to deploy. i.e: "/path/to/webapp.war" or "c:/mydir/webapp.war". (Required)

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used for retrieving Admin Server's URL and credentials.

formElement.label: Targets:
formElement.documentation: Targets on which to deploy the application or module (comma-separated list of the target servers, clusters, or virtual hosts).

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for weblogic.Deployer.

formElement.label: setDomainEnv Script Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the setDomainEnv script, including filename and extension. i.e: "/path/to/setDomainEnv.sh" or "setDomainEnv.cmd".

formElement.label: weblogic jar Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the weblogic jar, needed to run the deployer function. In Windows environment, if the jar is already added to the enviroment classpath variable, then is not necesary to include it. In Linux environment you must include the path. i.e: "/path/to/weblogic.jar" or "/root/Oracle/Middleware/wlserver_10.3/server/lib/weblogic.jar".
